com.kuka.roboticsAPI.applicationModel.tasks
Interface ITaskFunctionProvider

public interface ITaskFunctionProvider

Interface for task that provide functions.

This interface must be implemented by tasks that provide the implementation for custom task functions. Tasks which provide functions have to declare their function using ProvidedFunctions annotation and create instances of the functions and return them from createTaskFunctions() method.

Method Summary
 java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends ITaskFunction>,ITaskFunction> createTaskFunctions()
          Should return a list of mappings of task function interfaces to task functions instances.
 

Method Detail

createTaskFunctions

java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends ITaskFunction>,ITaskFunction> createTaskFunctions()
Should return a list of mappings of task function interfaces to task functions instances.

The method must be implemented by the application programmer by filling in the mappings of task function interfaces to task function instances. This method will be called by the framework only once after IRoboticsAPITask.initialize() method.
Keys in the returned map should be the same classes as declared in ProvidedFunctions annotation of the implementing class.

Returns:
A map of task function classes and the instantiated task function.
